mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_reply(rno, no, reply, replyer) VALUES (seq_reply.nextval, #{no}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_reply SET reply = #{reply}, updatedate = sysdate WHERE rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: SELECT rno, no, reply, replyer, replyDate, updatedate FROM t_reply WHERE no = #{no} ORDER BY rno asc
